d2_dictionary.title: Dictionary for Drug Product Manufacturer.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: SELECT object_name AS name FROM d2_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_name = 'Manufacturer' AND object_name != ' ' UNION SELECT drug_product_manufacturer AS name FROM cd_quality_project_info WHERE ANY drug_product_manufacturer != ' '
